title: Piskei Recanati
enDesc: Piskei Recanati is a 14th-century legal work on a range of topics by Italian scholar Rabbi Menachem Recanati, known for his writings on kabbalah. The work consists mainly of compilations of earlier legal works and varies in style, with some sections consisting of two or three terse lines and others containing lengthy discourses with detailed analysis. It was first published in the 16th-century and subsequently reprinted in several editions. Later authorities frequently quote Piskei Recanati as an authoritative source.
enShortDesc: 14th-century work by Italian scholar Rabbi Menachem Recanati, known for his writings on kabbalah.
